function.name: open_meteo
function.description: Complete weather data via Open-Meteo API (open source). Current weather, hourly/daily forecasts, air quality, geocoding. 100% free, no API key required, unlimited for non-commercial use.

location.description: Location name for geocoding operation (e.g., 'Paris', 'New York', 'Tokyo')

lat.description: Latitude (-90 to 90). Required for weather/air quality operations

lon.description: Longitude (-180 to 180). Required for weather/air quality operations

wind_speed_unit.description: Wind speed unit (kmh=km/h, ms=m/s, mph=miles/h, kn=knots). Default: kmh

timezone.description: Timezone for forecast times (e.g., 'Europe/Paris', 'America/New_York', 'auto'). Default: auto

forecast_days.description: Number of forecast days for daily forecast. Default: 7, max: 16

forecast_hours.description: Number of forecast hours for hourly forecast. Default: 24, max: 168 (7 days)

past_days.description: Include past days in forecast (0-92). Default: 0

language.description: Language code for location names (e.g., 'en', 'fr', 'de', 'es'). Default: en

limit.description: Max results for geocoding operations. Default: 5, max: 100
